I wear make up pretty much daily, and I have always loved using liquid liner, but I can never find one that is both affordable and actually works well. This liner by XTAVA is perhaps one of my favorites I have ever used. I am not a pro at using liquid liner, but I find this one to be very smooth and it really goes on easily even for newbies.The color is a little dark for my complexion, but it really has to be because of the way liquid liner works. This goes very well with XTAVA mascara, which I happen to use in my daily routine and love.When applying this liner to your lid, you don't want to over correct too much. It will glide on easily and personally I think you should only use it for your top lid, and then use a pencil liner for your bottom lid. The "brush" is small and great for wings and angles and designs. This is a professional make up for the normal girl.I attached a few photos of the product in action, so you can see why this is the liquid liner for you.I received this product at a promotional discount for the exchange of an honest and unbiased review. The views expressed are my own.

These silicone gloves make life a whole lot easier when you cook and bake as much as I do. They protect a lot better than using a potholder that will absorb the heat and still make your hand feel uncomfortable. They are a bit big on my tiny hands, but my husband loves the way that they fit and flex with his movements. They go up around your wrist, so you can reach into your oven without even getting close to burning yourself on the racks or whatever you're lifting. These are the best replacement you could possibly get for your old cloth gloves.I received this product at a promotional discount for the exchange of an honest and unbiased review. The views expressed are my own.

The more I travel, the more things I seem to pack and need to juggle in the airport. I feel like when I travel alone I always have bags dropping and I am not able to get around as fast because of that. It makes me so happy that I can use this to make running around a little easier. So far it has been great to wrap around my bag and go. Easy to put on as well as easy to take off. Everyone who travels should have a bag bungee.I received this product at a promotional discount for the exchange of an honest and unbiased review. The views expressed are my own.

I love the idea of an expandable, not kink-able hose! Along with the nozzle, this is the hose that can keep your garden and yard well watered and looking great! The aspect of the shut off nozzle is great. You are wasting a lot less water and it is easier to shut off and make sure that no one gets soaked in the process. The hose is very easy to put away and hardly takes up any space for storage!The length has allowed for much better gardening on my part, and the hose itself is genuinely made like no other.This is a great deal compared to the awful expandable hoses you can buy at bigger stores. I am very pleased.I received this product at a promotional discount for the exchange of an honest and unbiased review. The views expressed are my own.

These are a lot smaller than I expected. They just barely fit 5-6 slices. They don't really do more than another raised pan. I like the grease drain feature, which makes them truly one use and disposable. The one use feature would cause me not to buy these as I like to reuse my pans.

These are just large enough to be seen. Each earring was packaged in a separate plastic bag to keep them from scratching each other. There are five blue diamonds in the front. I will wear these with a matching infinity pendant.

This is a small but visible pendant with a sterling silver chain. It was packaged with the chain in a separate compartment inside the plastic bag to keep it from scratching the pendant. There are five blue diamonds and five white diamonds. I will wear over a white or light colored top to show it off properly.

My skin around my feet and ankles is very dry due to the change towards cold weather. I rubbed this on early in the morning and at night before going to bed. At first worked very well. I felt no itching at all. Today my skin itched badly and nothing could stop it, not even a long massage of this product. In general, I think it works well under normal conditions, but there will be times when it will not. RE: the complaints of odd feeling on hands, I did not experience that. I do a lot of dish washing and I do not like to wear gloves. This moisturizer protects well against the constant submerging under hot water. Over time, I believe this product will work well and protect my ankles as well as it protects my hands.

I am getting older and it is getting harder to maintain my own pedicure. I am so glad I ordered this when it was offered as a lightning deal. It used to take me over an hour to clip and file. Now I complete the whole job in less than half an hour. The implements give me a variety of finishes and I finally got rid of my calluses. Why pay more for another brand name when this is so much better? I also am trying to get info on replacement parts. Although it runs on two AA batteries, I saw no loss of power while using for the first full hour. This is a truly portable device that I can take with me anywhere. Since I am a traveler, it feels good to know that I am not dependent on wall power to keep my nails  smooth and buffed.

I may be a little premature but, so far, this works well for me. I needed a light to see my ignition inside the car. I ordered this because it was more economical. The backing peeled off easily and the light stuck to my key quickly. Great little gadget.

I sit a lot and I needed something to help relax my lower back. This works wonderfully! The heat is just enough to work well with the vibrations. This is not just for back pain. When I have an upset stomach, I use this instead of meds to help me relax. This makes the pain go away. I wanted to use this on a long drive but I am afraid the vibrations will put me to sleep, like they are doing now!

I wanted a pearl bracelet that I could wear with casual clothes. This was a lovely and inexpensive choice. My bracelet is ivory and it has a nice lustre. It was a little difficult to put on by myself, at first, but got easier with a little practice.
I ordered this to match a pair of dangling dual pearl earrings and they are perfect together. The chain is thicker than I expected. The extender is  help when I wear turtlenecks.

This is a nice soft blanket but it is a little too thick for me. I prefer a thinner flannel fabric. That said, this is quite nice for really cold nights. It warms up the bed quickly and I can turn down the heat to stay just warm enough to sleep. I have tried only one side, but it does work well. The cords are a little too thick but they do the job. Overall, it is a good value for use with two sleepers.

These look much better than the photo, although they could stand to be a little more shiny. I would have preferred a full matte or glossy finish. The three colors of gold are definitely distinctive. These are larger than I thought they would be and that is nice. These are good for casual or business wear. The grooved design is not deep enough to give these an evening look. Overall they are very nice.

This is a delicate piece of jewelry. I prefer my jewelry small but this could be a little bigger. There are three diamonds that I could find and they do sparkle. This could dress up a casual outfit or it would work well for an evening out. The chain is nice and a little fragile. A diamante might work better to show off the glitz. Overall, I like it and cannot wait to wear it.

I bought the towels some time ago and I am glad the program offered the matching floor mat. It is just the right size and I love the thick pile for sinking my toes into. This is a nice addition to my bathroom linens.

I will not use anything else but Reynolds Wrap Heavy Duty foil. I always use this brand for lining my barbeque grill. It is strong enough to hold and remove the used charcoal without breaking or tearing. I also use this for other household tasks when I need something strong. My house cannot be without it.

This is an interesting collection of doodle like flowers that lend themselves to all sorts of designs if a person is creative enough. They would probably look striking in metallic. I will find out soon.

I was nervous because I received a mini CD and my laptop cannot recognize that size. However, when I put this disk in the tray, my system was able to read it. I am happy because these are really beautiful motifs.
I wanted this set of african baby animals to go with my adult african animals set. They are really nice together.
This is a nice selection of colors. I even like the green. However, I also received a sample cone of very light peach embroidery thread and 5 bobbins.

I love to play with the metallic threads on my embroidery machine. This is a nice selection of colors: 30 solids and 2 variegated. The cones are very small, though. My "free gift" was not included.08/21 update: the seller sent me an email apologizing for the free gift not being included with my order. They will send it soon.09/04 update: I received the bobbins. They are universal bobbins filled with high sheen poly thread. I should be able to use these in my Brother machine.

Embroidex must have listened to the customers because the product I received is great. I have all 32 feet inside its own spot in foam and a plastic case. The instructions are in english and have pictures with the names and descriptions of how to use each foot. That helps a lot because I have not heard of most of these. I have a Singer Futura XL 580 and I cannot wait to try these out.Here is the list of what I got:Braiding Foot  Satin Stitch FootFringe Foot  Jaguar/All Purpose Foot5 Hole Cording Foot  7 Hole Cording FootEdge Joining Foot  1/4" Quilting FootStraight Stitch Foot  Open Toe Embroidery FootRound Bead Foot  Zigzag FootCording Foot  1/4" Quilting Foot with edgeOvercast Foot  Stitch Guide FootDouble Welting Foot  Invisible Zipper FootRoller Foot  Blind Stitch FootAppliqu Foot  Open Toe FootShirring Foot  Darning FootKnit Foot  Zipper FootHemmer Foot  1/8" Round Hemmer FootDarning foot Low Shank  Adjustable Bias Tape Binder FootPintuck Foot 5 grooves  Pintuck Foot 9 grooves

I am disappointed that these do not look as nice as their photo. As one reviewer said, the stones are barely seeable and the silver has a matte finish that is not all that attractive. I will keep them as casual earrings.
This is a great looking suit. It is a couple of shades darker than beige with thin pinstriping.
This is a lot larger than I thought it would be. It is really quite beautiful. I had bought this for a present for someone, but it is too beautiful to give away. I will find her something else!

These are the style of earrings I like to wear to work when I want to look nice but don't want to have spent a lot of money. I travel a lot and there are so many opportunities to lose things. The clasps are sturdy so I would not be afraid of losing these. The metal is lightweight. They have a matte finish which I find to be more classy than a high gloss finish.

Mine finally arrived and I find it to be just perfect. I like the alternating fleur de lis and vines motif. This bracelet is more than large enough to wear on my wrist comfortably. I checked it over, just in case, but found no stress fractures or blemishes. It has a glossy shine but is not gaudy. Overall, it is a great value.

This is a nice selection and there is plenty of thread per spool. I had to throw one away because it was covered with dirt (?) and was discolored. It looked like a mouse might have been at it. I took the time to count them and I received only 51 cones. So, I got 50 usable cones. Some colors are gorgeous but as one reviewer mentioned, the thread is weak. I will have to sew at a much slower speed to get any use from these. Since I was shorted 9 cones, I will not order these again.

The earrings are small but very pretty and the stones are large enough to be seen. The black&white diamond motif looks so good with sterling silver or white gold. I got the matching pendant to complete the set.

This pendant is small but very pretty and the stones are large enough to be seen. The black&white diamond motif looks so good with sterling silver or white gold. I got the matching earrings to complete the set.
The actual suit looks much better than the photo. The color is a cross between mauve and rose, really beautiful. The fit is as I expected. I wish this had trousers to match.

The product description says sapphire but I got winterberry, which is what I really wanted. I wish the jacket were available in my size because this would make an awesome suit. The fabric is a spongy thin crepe which is much too nice for the office. The narrower leg bottoms go perfect with heels.

I like to have as many colors as possible in my wardrobe. Green trousers are so difficult to find. Thankfully this suit is available. As such a low price, I got two. One will be a suit and the other will be worn as separates. The fit is fine and long length of the pants suit me.

This book is a humorous account of 13 love affairs, most of which ended badly. At least that is my interpretation. The author gives a historical run-up to the subjects in the stories, which does help to better understand what happened during the relationships and why they failed. Some of the stories I already knew about such as Lucrezia Borgia, Oscar Wilde and Nero, but there were a few nuggets that were worth learning about. Unrequited love must have worked for some of the subjects who went on to write or do great things. Some of the participants were just plain weird and one wonders how they were able to attract a lover at all. The book is a fast read, great for passing time while traveling or waiting somewhere. You will not be bored.

This redwork designs CD contains some patterns on the Christmas tree theme. The simple designs lend themselves to further creativity and work especially well with variegated and metallic threads. I've practiced with some beautiful metallic colors. You can build on a traditional theme or create something unique. Also, there are more free patterns in all formats to complete your winter motif. The price is right for this product.

I originally bought this as a gift for my sister. However, when I received it, I decided I might keep it because it is so pretty. Based on some of the reviews, I did not expect much but mine is nice. The gold setting really makes the stones sparkle and I have no probelm with their setting. I wish there were matching earrings, though. I have a pair of round multi-stones hoop earrings but the stones are round. Hopefully I will find something. In the meantime, this is a keeper!

I wanted something nice but not too expensive to ship my watches. This more than fits the bill for me. Inside is crushed velvet and outside is smooth leather. It is just the right size for my collection.

This product was received as a part of the Vine program. The pendant is lovely and just a tad small but still nice to wear. The chain seems sturdy and is long enough for a tall woman like me. The diamonds are visible and set well in the body. I wish there were matching earrings to complete the set.

The weather where I live is unpredictable this time of the year. The nights may be cold or hot but we cannot tell in advance. This blanket is comfortable no matter the weather or inside temp. I like the weave and the fabric is soft. I tend to stay with colors that match well with ivory and this works fine with the comforters and sheets I already have. I am pleased with this blanket.
This is a true blue, not navy or midnight. Very nice suit, although I was hoping it was a little lighter to match a pair of shoes I bought.
What a nice suit! It definitely dresses up my wardrobe. The taupe fabric has a nice shimmer.
What a nice suit! It definitely dresses up my wardrobe. The peacock fabric has a nice shimmer.

What a pleasure it has been to read this novel. I had never read a novel by Sandra Dallas before, but I will be avidly reading her others. This novel was so utterly satisfying that she is now one of my favourite authors and I've added her website to the links on the side of this blog: http://greathistoricalfiction.blogspot.com.Brilliantly researched, Sandra captures the essence of the times and the numerous hardships faced by women of all ages. The stories has roots in the historical past - she studied the plight of midwives who found themselves face to face with the law when a birth went awry. There is a strong tone of doing the right thing, no matter the injustices the main character faces. The protaganist is a woman called Gracy Brookens, a skilled and respected midwife. Clearly unselfish, caring, and dedicated to helping women, there is much to laud in this character. Courageous and determined, she faces adversity in a way that is startling stoic.The prose is lovely and flowing, and the descriptions perfect - enough to bring the scene to life without slowing the pace. Although on the surface, this novel looks like it might be purely historical or women's fiction, there is a mystery at its heart, a bonus to an already rich tale. I admire Sandra Dallas' talent and am eager to read more of her novels. Thorough enjoyable! 5 stars and more!Thank you to the author and publisher. I received a free copy of this book in exchange for an honest review.

I love this tote! I am thoroughly enjoying carrying this bag. It is made of a high quality synthetic leather of sturdy thickness that is nice and soft to the touch. Everything about the bag screams luxury, including the silky lined interior. to experience this luxury handbag. I chose the navy blue bag so that it will look dressy even when wearing my jeans. The exterior is easy to maintain - just a quick wipe and it will be clean!The inside is nicely lined in a thick silky polyester material. No flimsy fraying lining in this tote - that's for sure! There are two open pockets on one side made for sliding things into it like keys, or phone. Simply slide these items into the pockets and they will be easy to find. A full length zipper at the top safely closes to secure the contents. There is a nice sized zippered enclosure on the outside too - another place for keys or phone.The bag is a nice size, can hold plenty, and the straps are comfortable when hanging over your shoulder. Its sturdy construction ensures it will last for a long time.This is the second product I've received from Hynes. I also have the emoji backpack. Both products are greatly beloved and I'm extremely impressed with this company. I love all their bags. Highly recommended.

A great Xmas present to purchase online on Amazon!I'm really enjoying my latest toy. It's the Inateck Marsbox Bluetooth 4.0 Wireless Speaker. I've become a big fan of Inateck Products because this company delivers on high quality at an affordable price.This bluetooth speaker has a built in FM Radio and a built in microphone so when I am busy at my laptop or making a craft, I can dial my phone handsfree!What I love most is that it has a really long battery life, which allows me to move the speaker from bedroom to kitchen to garage easily without any trouble at all. This is great when I'm in the kitchen as I can listen to an audio book as I'm busy working.What my husband loves most about this speaker is that it is very, very loud and powerful. And I truly mean this. Incredible sound comes out of this compact little box. As with other Inateck products, it is very easy to pair with your devices. When it is in use, there's a lovely blue light that shows its operating. The speaker comes with a well laid out instruction manual that makes it easy for even those who are technology challenged to follow.Everything about this speaker screams quality. It is of a nice weight, not flimsy at all. In fact, it has a rubberized feel and is very stable wherever it is set down. The black/red color is stunning and it has large buttons that are easily visible with maxiumum accessiblity. The power cords that come with it are sturdy and covered in an enhanced material that protects the actual cord. They come beautifully wrapped and are red and black in color. The product comes with an aux cable, micro USB cable, a felt carry pouch and a user manual. The battery on this thing is rated for 10 hours minimum which is very good as wellI'm an avid Netflix watcher and one of my favourite luxuries is to sit in bed and watch a movie or a tv program on my tablet. Hence I keep the speaker on my bedside table and prefer the sound from the speaker than the sound that comes from my tablet. And as stated earlier, I also love listening to an audio book with the Marsbox.I have easily connected the Marsbox to my Samsung phone, my Samsung Galaxy 10.1 Tab, and my iPad mini! When my phone rungs, I can answer the call and speak and listen through this speaker. I don't know how I ever lived without it.

Season 3 Namaste Yoga DVD continues witht the same levels of excellence as the earlier version. Erica Blitz leads us through 13 episodes/sessions, all filmed amid the beauty of British Columbia's coast. The sessions are:Soften the EdgesAlign your AxisWarrior WisdomRelease and RestoreCreate your CalmReflect and ConnectThese sessions are each 22 minutes in length, providing enough workouts for the week to do something a little different each day. I do one session before bed each night. Like all Namaste DVDs, this particular one has stunning visuals, lush music that relaxes as well as entertains, awesome production quality, and is led by a leading yoga practioner. The movements flowed nicely from one pose to another, and each session was easily adapted to my own strength and level leaving me plenty of room to grow and become more adept at each pose.Namaste Yoga is perfect for all skill levels and well worth the time. Everything about these DVDs is classy, beautifully rendered, and expertly taught. These are the DVDs to get if you are interested in embarking on a yoga regine! My only reget is that I did not aquire the entire first, second, and third seasons! But that will soon be remedied!  Highly recommended.

There are countless benefits to yoga, and researchers hail its numerous, powerful benefits. I am a 56 year old novelist, so I spend long hours each day at my desk. I embarked on a yoga program to stretch and keep my muscles limber. Namaste Yoga is a world leader and innovator in yoga with a strong reputation in the field, so I felt that their videos were the best way to begin. And I am pleased to say that I was right!  Visually stunning, the Namaste Yoga DVD narrated by Kate Potter is wonderful for beginners like me. The video has 6 segments/poses: exalted warrior, sun moon, firebird, gate opening, dancing sun, and half moon. Each segment is 22 minutes long. The beauty of this yoga instructional dvd is that my body was challenged, and the more I practice, the better I get. There are no poses that caused me to lose my balance or over-worked my muscles. There is both a warm up and cool down phase. Along with my time in the gym on the treadmill and some weight training, this yoga dvd has been a wonderful addition to my work-outs. Kate Potter's soothing voice, gentle style, set against beautiful backgrounds and relaxing music, makes practicing yoga a wonderful gift to myself. I look forward to the end of the day, as I do the program right before bedtime. Not only am I relaxed, but I feel calmed.

Antoinette May has re-envisioned Mary's life in a most comprehensive and compelling way. She brings to life the famous poets who were integral to Mary's life, namely Percy Bysshe Shelly and Lord Byron. In doing so, she shows us the darker side of these famous men, their human failings as well as their genius talents. The writing of Frankenstein is not foremost in the novel. Rather, the reader discovers the elements of Mary's life that gave rise to novel and the monster's creation.What I enjoyed about this novel is that the characters were presented without prejudice, leaving the reader to decide whether they liked them or not, including Mary. Secret affairs, obsession, friendship, and debauchery line this novels pages, demonstrating their effects upon the main characters. Congratulations to the author for writing such an indepth biographical fiction novel about this fascinating woman's life. Truly unforgettable!

Shriver has to be the most uniquely fascinating book I have ever read. It is vastly different, unclassifiable, and intensely entertaining. The back cover blurb aptly describes what the book is about, but it does little to express just how charming this little book truly is. Its pages are filled with quirky characters, outlandish situations, a protaganist who is a loser in real life, but who readers ultimately fall in love with. The books beauty is in its simplicity - easy to read, brief, witty. I definitely recommend this great little book, especially for readers who want something unique, whimsical, enchanting!  Thank you to the author and publisher. I received a free copy of this book in exchange for an honest review.

The Visitant by Megan Chance is a delightful gothic tale set in Venice. Elena Spira travels from the U.S. to Basilio Palazzo to work as a private nurse for an epileptic man named Samuel Ferber. The mood is set with the crumbling palazzo and its location in a less than desirable, neglected area of Venice ripe with crime and plagued with filth. Further, an old aunt and a female servant and their suspicious, untoward behavior adds curiosity and tension to the story as it progresses. Once there, Elena encounters an impoverished nobleman named Nero Basilio (whose family owns the decrepit palazzo). Seizures, ghost sightings, addiction, family secrets, and loyalties are revealed throughout. The ending was definitely an unexpected surprise. This was a truly enjoyable cozy gothic mystery. Definitely satisfying!Thank you to the author and publisher. I received a free copy of this book in exchange for an honest review.

Whitney and her cousin own two restaurants that are failing. As she struggles to keep them afloat, her attention is drawn by an old hotel she has inherited and her elderly, ailing stepfather who lives there alone. Could the hotel be sold to prop up her restaurants and save them from failure? When she arrives, she discovers old letters that when pieced together, provide her with details of an old romance and a long buried secret.Whitney is the protaganist and there are two men who she becomes embroiled with - each with different intentions regarding the hotel. All the characters were well drawn, their personalities and motivations clear throughout the tale. I especially enjoyed the cantankerous stepfather, Clyde, who evolves with the story. He added loads of fun and frustration. The real root of the story, however, are the letters. They were well done, revealing bits and pieces of the historical mystery as the story unfolds. Brilliant! And like all good novels, there is a love connection too that was really well done and comes about slowly, realisticaly. My favourite part of this book is the surprise ending I didn't see coming.Yup, there is definitely lots to like with this book. A definite recommendation for women's fiction, book clubs, and/or simply a good tale to fall into and forget the world for a few hours.Thank you to the author and publisher. I received a free copy of this book in exchange for an honest review.

Review by Mirella Patzer - http://www.historyandwomen.comThe exotic setting of old China has always fascinated me. This novel is set in the Qing Dynasty of the 1880's and opens with the execution of 7 year old Sai Jinhua's father. Her mother was a concubine who died in childbirth. Her father remarried, but he has been executed for political reasons. Unwanted, Jinhua's stepmother sells her to a brothel where she will live until she is old enough to begin work as a prostitute. The life there is very harsh and Sai Jinhau is subjected to having her feet bound. At twelve, Sai Jinhua loses her innocence and joins the other prostitues in their work. The novel follows her life and her rise when she is sold to Hong, a Chinese Diplomat who is beguiled by her resemblance to his first wife who committed suicide.  Together, they travel to Vienna where Jinhua is a novelty. There, she experiences freedom and knowledge and gains self-confidence. But Hong dislikes her newfound strength and empowermentis and more and more he keeps her locked away from society.Nicely researched, I thought the complexities of the Qing Dynasty were aptly described. The early life of this poor orphan who faced such horrendous circumstances was fascinating. I found the first half of the book unputdownable, and the pace slowed a bit thereafter, and I became a bit detached from the story. Some of the magic was lost, but the story still held my interest enough to get to the ending. A nice novel that swept me into a time and a world of long ago. A fascinating woman of history indeed!Thank you to the author and publisher. I received a free copy of this book in exchange for an honest review.

This is the opening book in an exciting new trilogy entitled the Abraxas Chronicles, and it is a true stunner. The opening sentences hooked me until the story's ultimate conclusion. All the elements I love are included: an old abbey, a gothic feel, a multi-layered romance, murder, and an exciting plot! The secrets of an ancient old cult thrust the lives of three young persons into peril and force their separation, affecting them each in diverse ways. It was all so very fascinating and intriguing.Beautifully written, brilliantly plotted, this is a must read, especially for fans of Ken Follett, or aficionados of books set in the medieval era. It is much more than a murder myster, much more than a saga, much more than a romance. It is rich in every way. Loved it! Will definitely read more from this author. You should read it too! I am eagerly anticipating book 2 in the trilogy.Thank you to the author. I received a free copy of this book in exchange for an honest review.

In an exciting new trilogy, Author Elizabeth Chadwick brings to life Eleanor of Aquitaine. The first book, The Summer Queen, covers her life through the 2nd crusade to the annullment of her marriage to Louis VII, king of France.The Winter Crown is the second in this tremendously vivid and engaging trilogy.Being a woman in the 12th century was fraught with turbulence. Arranged marriages for political reasons, the duty of bearing sons, ever constant warfare, intrigues of courtly life, and dangers of childbirth. These were the everyday fears women faced, especially Eleanor of Aquitaine.One of the most powerful women of her time, she was the daughter of the Duke of Aquitaine and Count of Poitou. Not only was she a woman of great beauty, but she inherited immense wealth, making her one of the most sought-after women of her time.When she was fifteen, she married Louis VII of France, a young price of her own age. When his father died, they were crowned King and Queen. They reined for fifteen years with Eleanor being the smarter one with a stronger, more vocal personality. During that time, Eleanor proved semi-fruitful. She provided her husband with two daughters, but no sons.Eleanor was not afraid of war. In fact, she convinced her husband to initiate a crusade into the Holy Land and rode proudly at the front of their army. Her failure to provide her husband was one reason their marriage failed. It was annulled and Eleanor's vast dowry lands in Aquitaine and Poitiers were lawfully returned to her. She was thirty years old, still beautiful, still wealthy, and highly desirable. She soon came to the attention of Henry Plantaganet, the grandson of England's King Henry I. He was twelve years younger than Eleanor when they married. Her lands brought power and greater wealth to England, even more than that of her ex-husband.Despite their stormy marriage, Eleanor provide herself a very good breeder, providing her husband with several sons, two of which would be destined to become English kings. All the while, she ruled her own lands and was a strong participant in English politics. Because of her love for the written word, she helped give light to Courtly Love.As the years passed, her marriage deteriorated. She became a great adversary to her husband and even encouraged and supported her sons in a revolt against him. All their best efforts failed and her husband captured and arrested her. He kept her in custody in strict, less comfortable conditions in a monastery at Fontevrault, Anjou. She spent what remained of her life there and died at the age of 82 in the year 1204.Elizabeth Chadwick continues this spellbinding tale of one of the most renowned queens of medieval times - Eleanor of Aquitaine. Her story has endured over the centuries, and has been immortalized in movies and books, but never before has there been a more indepth recreation of her life than this trilogy by this most beloved author. The Winter Crown picks up where The Summer Queen leaves us - Eleanor is newly married to the king of England. Full of conflict, Chadwick brings to life their tumultuous marriage clearly shows the strength and tenacity of this famous queen.Although it is not necessary to read the trilogy in order, I highly recommend you do so to get the full history of this fascinating queen. Readers areeagerly awaiting the third book, The Autumn Throne, which is currently in the writing stage - it will definitely be worth the wait!I received a free copy of this book in exchange for an honest review through Netgalley!For the full review, including video and links, please visit http://www.historyandwomen.com/2015/10/she-wolf-and-queen-crusader-eleanor-of.html

The Sisters of Versailles is a biographical fiction novel about the five Nesle sisters, four of which became the mistresses of King Louis XV. They are Louise, Pauline, Adelaide, Hortense, and Marie Anne. The novelist did an excellent job of recreating the grandeur of the 18th century French court of the "Sun King". She aptly describes the lush glittering palaces, luxurious gowns, the cruel and painful intrigues, and disturbing cramped living conditions some of the lesser members of the court endured. The novel is written in the first person point of view of the sisters, which clearly brought to life their personalities and differences. The characters each developed uniquely, brilliantly, and in sometimes unpredictable ways.As with all biographical novels, there are times when the pace slows a bit, but in this case, the interest in court life kept me reading with keeness. This is the introductory book of a planned trilogy about these fascinating sisters, and I'm definitely looking forward to the next two installments, which swill bring to life some of the king's more notorious mistresses.Thank you to the author and publisher. I received a free copy of this book in exchange for an honest review.

All the Stars in Heaven is a rich novel that sweeps the reader into the golden age of Hollywood. Numerous famous actors and actresses make an appearance in this tale. Young is a young actress who falls in love with Spencer Tracy. Among the famous personages is a young nun by the name of Alda who has her own tale to tell which is interwoven between the pages.The novel is on the longer side at approximately 450 pages, but well worth read. It is a well written tale with plenty of historical detail that is colored with the author's interpretation of Loretta Young's relationships. I could not help but fall in love with Clark Gable. Adriana writes him just as I imagined, a lovable, handsome rogue with plenty of humor and spirit, a womanizer, but one who is higly adorable. I fell in love with Clark Gable through and through. I was glad I read the book on my iPad Kindle app because I kept stopping to query photos of the people and places mentioned in the book. It helped cement the story in my mind while lending it a whole bunch of credence.There is a ton to like about this story. Never rushed, but vivid, I adored the story very much, even though I experienced a bit of sadness that Clark and Loretta were never meant to be. A very good novel to savor! This is the first time I've read a book by Adriana Trigiani, but I plan to read a bit more of her work. I defintely enjoyed her style of writing. 4.5 stars out of 5!

Sara Donati's latest novel is set in the late 1800's in New York City. At the heart of the story are two women, Anna and Sophie Savard who are both doctors specializing in women's health. Along with their passion for their work and the women they help, they both struggle to survive in the male oriented occupation amd the social norms and prejudices of the time - namely, against contraception and abortion, no matter the reason.This is a long novel - about 700 pages or so. But don't let that distract you. Contained within every page are a barrage of historical details, accurate and relevant to the times. It is very much a novel about women's struggles and their fight to seize control of their own health. And although this character driven novel is not fast paced, it is nevertheless engrossing and a manual of learning for this very tumultuous time in history. Sara Donati includes numerous real, notorious characters of the time in addition to the well-crafted fictional ones. Her research into New York City before the turn of the century is definitely vivid, accurate, and compelling, as is her portrayal of doctors, nurses, and the health system of the time. All this makes this an important historical novel that not only entertains, but teaches us.The characters face plenty of hardships and there is the plight of three orphaned Italian children forcefully separated by authorities. The main characters show compassion in coming to their aid and searching for the lost children. And of course, there is a love story too, some midwifery, and the rise of some women out of slavery. Yes, there is a lot going on, which makes this novel truly rich and compelling. Truly, this is historical women's fiction at its best and I highly recommend it.Thank you to the author and publisher. I received a free copy of this book in exchange for an honest review.The full review can also be viewed on http://www.historyandwomen.com/2015/10/book-review-gilded-hour-by-sara-donati.html and http://greathistoricalfiction.blogspot.com/2015/10/the-gilded-hour-by-sara-donati.html

The Gates of Rutherford is a family saga of the Cavendish family. It is the third book in the series following on the tales of and Rutherford Park (Book 1) and The Wild Dark Flowers (Book 2). I had no opportunity to read either of the earlier books, and although I wish I had read the series in the order they were meant to be read, I was still able to follow along despite the references to the earlier plots.Rutherford Park is a stately manor. The story takes us into the lives and loves of the Cavendish family, with all the rank and pomp of the nobility vs the working class just like the tv series Downtown Abbey. The story highlights the struggles of a noble family to adjust their lives in the face of the upheaval caused by World War I. It clearly depicts the erosion of societal ranks and the struggles the gentry faced as they tried to cling to what remained of their fading lifestyles. Elizabeth Cooke brings her characters to life with brilliance, aptly describing love, loss, and the horrors of war. A nice historical saga of a family torn between the future and the past.Thank you to the author and publisher. I received a free copy of this book in exchange for an honest review.

As a long time admirer of author Anita Davison, I was happy to read Murder on the Minneapolis, an historical cozy mystery. Flora Maguire is a young governess charged with escorting her employer's young son, Edwqard, back home to England via the oceanliner, The Minneapolis. It is the ship's maiden voyage and most of the passengers are wealthy, except for Flora. Once on board, she meets Bunny Harrington, a well-to-do young businessman who deals with automobiles. When Flora discovers the body of a man at the foot of the companionway, she is embroiled in the mystery and is determined to find out what happened.This story had a bit of everything - atmosphere, mystery, romance, and suspense. I was kept guessing until the end as to the murderer and their motivation. Set on an oceanliner afloat in the international waters between North America and England, I found the story unique and intriguing. There were plenty of fascinating charaters that kept me interested throughout - a matronly ascerbic socialite, a steely doctor, and a headstrong captain, to name a few. All scenes were vividly described. The succinct writing made for a fast pace with plenty of conflict and mystery. From start to finish, I was thoroughly absorbed in the story. This is definitely a 5 star cozy mystery! Highly recommended. Thank you to the author and publisher. I received a free copy of this book in exchange for an honest review.

When Sir Josse dAcquin and Helewise visit his beloved uncle Hugh, they are shocked to find him in ill health. In fact, he is dying. Worse yet, Hugh has married a woman who is cold and callous, especially in her treatment of a small six year old boy who will become Hugh's heir. The child is terrorized by a monster who haunts him at night. All is not well in the home. Something is amiss. The unpleasantness only worsens when a badly injured stranger is brought into the home in an effort to save his life. All these subplots are slowly weaved together to create a wonderfully creative gothic style mystery that kept me madly turning the pages.I've never read any books by this author, but I will in the future because she has hooked me with this one. She is an adept author who knows how to keep conflict and mystery building from beginning to end. Her descriptions of characters and surroundings are vivid and easily envisioned while reading. I especially loved the complex characters because they are never what they initially appear to be. If you love great villains, one you truly become emotionally involved with, then this book will surely satisfy. This is a wonderful mystery and you don't need to read the earlier books in the series to enjoy it. Highly recommended.Thank you to the author and publisher. I received a free copy of this book in exchange for an honest review.

The Dress Thief sweeps readers into the heart of Paris during the rise of the fashion industry - from the fashion designers to the manufacturing to the runway. From the very beginning, one cannot feel anything but sympathy for the plight of Alix who lives in poverty with her ailing grandmother, Meme, but who possesses powerful dreams to one day become a fashion designer. She is befriended by a young man named Paul, also poor who cares for his younger sisters. It is Paul who entices her into becoming a thief - whose contacts get her a job at a leading fashion house where she is to copy the designs prior to their launch for reproduction in the United States.Alix has a secret benefactor, a wealthy Count, who has taken care of her through the years and who has an unclear connection to her Meme and her dead mother. It is this connection which causes him to be the victim of a blackmail plot in which Alix finds herself involved. Lives are at risk until the blackmailer can be identified and stopped. With several antagonists and suspicious characters, there are plenty of surprises and twists throughout. I found myself becoming emotionally involved with strong impressions regarding each character.Natalie Meg Evans has a strong understanding of the fashion industry of the era and this comes through in her sharp writing. This is a very long book at approximately 592 pages. Although the plot slows a little in the middle, there is plenty of story to keep the reader interested. It is not a story to be rushed - rather, it is one to be savoured for its wonderfully rich descriptions and details. It is no wonder this is an award winning book!Thank you to the author and publisher. I received a free copy of this book in exchange for an honest review.

I have been using this belt for over a week and I'm definitely enjoying it. I take it with me to the gym and wear it during my 30 minute weight work out and then for an hour on the treadmill. It easily holds my Samsung Note 4 (which is one of the biggest phones on the market) along with my keys and note cards where I keep track of my work-out. I like the belt much better than the arm cuffs for the same purpose because it can hold my keys too and does not restrict my movements when it is around my waist. There are numerous pockets and slots that can fit credit cards, documents. so it makes it ideal to use as a money/passport belt for travelers. The product description is exact and it is identical to what is advertised. It does not cause any sweating and does not stick to my skin while working out. I wear it over my tee-shirt, but can easily be worn under clothing depending on the wearer's preference. I can throw it in the washing machine, or hand wash it in the kitchen sink if I'm in a hurry. It dries fast. I also found that it gives my back a little support when I'm working out which I definitely like. It fits to size, but can easily be adjusted.Product received in exchange for an honest review.

5 reasons why you should take probiotics1. Probiotics improve your immunity! They can help your body fight off flues, colds, and allergies.2. Probiotics can fight off intestinal illnesses like irritable bowel syndrome, gut inflammations, and bloating.3. Probiotics can handle gluten sensitivity and help those with Celiac disease.4. Probiotics fight off the bacteria in our bodies that come from processed foods and low fiber diets.5. Probiotics help prevent cancer by adding nourishing enzymes to our body.I have been taking this probiotic for several weeks now and I have seen a significant decrease in my digestive system. Not only has it eliminated bloating from certain foods I eat, but it has also reduced the length and severity of my most recent illness by replenishing the good antibodies in my system while the anti-biotics were killing off the bad bacteria causing the illness. When summer is over and it's time to go back to school, it's time to boost your immune system to help fight off the onslaught of air borne viruses that will head our way. To do this, I've recently began taking pro-biotics. The brand I'm using is made by InMed Technologies from the U.S. It can be ordered from Amazon or directly from their website at http://www.inmedtech.co/Because 80% of our immune cells live in our gut, we need probiotics to keep the good bacteria growing and thriving there. InMed Tech goes to great length to grow the strongest, highest quality strains for their supplements. The best part is that keeping up with our probiotics can help our digestive systems running well which contributes to weight loss.InMed Tech is a quality product, backed by the highest standards of research and product testing. It comes with a 100% satisfaction guarantee!I received a free sample of this product in exchange for an honest review.

Do you enjoy though-provoking books that have such heart-wrenching plots, such shocking storylines, that it moves you for many days to come? This gripping novel, based on actual, true events, provokes a plethora of deep thoughts and emotions. They are brought to the New York City Hebrew Orphans Home that existed in the early 1900s. Rachel soon finds herself subjected to alarming medical experiments that leave Rachel scarred for life. The author does not shy away from describing the horrendously cruel experiments that included force feeding, physical restraints, and over exposure to radium through x-rays that left them bald. But Rachel survives and years later, she becomes a nurse. One of her patients, dying of terminal cancer, is the female doctor who subjected her to the medical trials. Now in a position of power over her previous tormenter, Rachel becomes obsessed with revenge.The plot becomes rich with a bevy of emotion and thought-provoking twists regarding forgiveness, hate, love, trust, vengeance, and more. At the end of the book, the author has included photographs acquired in research. Tremendously stirring, this is one novel not to miss. So human, so real, so true!Thank you to the author and publisher. I received a free copy of this book in exchange for an honest review.

When it comes to stories set during World War II, I am always more interested in those that focus on the plight of the civilians rather than the military experience. This is why I was drawn to this novel as it reflects some of what my own family experienced before my parents immigrated to Canada. The story is set in the north east area of Italy in a city named Fiume which became part of Yugoslavia, or today's Croatia. Through the experiences of two families, the author does a great job of introducing the hardships the civilians faced living under the auspices of danger and war and occupation. The loss of home, displaced refugees, unbearable acts of terror and cruelty, and the severe hunger caused by enemy seizures. It is how many Italians of that era found themselves contemplating relocation as refugees to safer havens such as Australia, Canada, or the U.S. In this novel, it is Australia they seek.Through the eyes of the protagonists, Ettore and Contessa, we experience the danger, the many kindnesses, the poignanat and painful moments of war. These characters represent thousands of Italians forced to flee their beloved homeland.  The author did a wonderful job of describing the effects of the war, along with the history of how that area of Italy was affected.This novel is definitely a worth reading, especially for those whose roots are deeply embedded in Italy, like me! Recommended!

As I began reading this novel, it became immediately apparent why this has been a #1 Bestseller on Amazon. Based on a true story, author James D. Shipman has brought to life an utterly compelling protaganist by the name of Joseph Forsyth. The plight of this character from his childhood throughout the novel is at times heart-wrenching, victorious, and amazingly impressive, a very true and believable hero.The characters in the story are so real, so believable, I could not help but become totally engrossed in many conflicts and trials they faced during the Civil War era. More importantly, the author has introduced the plight of the Irish immigrant who fled extreme poverty only to find themselves face to face with prejudice and new hardships.More importantly, this is a story about a man of honor and great character, one who earned his respect and teaches us all what it means to truly be of high moral standard, perseverence, tolerance, and many more lessons. I urge you to purchase this rich and vibrant novel. You won't be sorry.Thank you to the author and publisher. I received a free copy of this book in exchange for an honest review.

I have lots of devices - my Samsung Note 4, an iPad mini, a Samsung Galaxy tablet, a kindle, an iPod. And when the grand-kids stay over, I can add their iPads and mp3 players to the list. So I need lots of chargers. This power bank has 3 ports and a super fast charging depending on the size of the device - i.e. the smaller the device, the faster the charge. It has Auto IC which intuitively identifies the device and knows the speed it requires to charge. It is the size of a normal eyeglasses case, but a little heavier as it is made of sturdy plastic/metal. It fits easily into my purse and I take it with me whenever I travel. To charge it, you will need to plug it into a USB wall charger or your computer. Once charged, there is an on/off button on the side which illuminates 4 blue LED lights on the front, which also tells you how much charge the device has - 4 for fully charged and 1 for running out of charge. I really like the built-in torchlight. To activate it, all I have to do is press the on/off button two times in quick succession. It's really great to be able to depend on a device for a quick charge! So glad I have it.

I love this 4 port car charger. Finally, we can charge our smartphones and tablets at the same time, making this ideal for longer car trips. It looks and feels sturdy, obviously made with quality plastic and parts, yet it is very lightweight. When compared to my old car charger this one by far is much, must faster. Even with all four ports in use, charging various devices, it maintains a fast charge. Also, it is certified and I can use it without worry that it will malfunction or short-circuit. Definitely highly recommended.

I love a book that has many plot twists! And there are many in this novel! Each character kept evolving, and this kept me guessing as to what would happen next. A mother's lie, a father's denial, and the quest for revenge combined to make it a difficult story to put down. The novel is set in the early 20's, shortly after the First World War, a time of great upheaval and societal changes. The theme of abandonment by Rachel's father was rather poignant, as was the anger experienced that set her off on a course of revenge. Despite the need for vengeance, Rachel still came across as likable. The more she learned about the people involved, the more she became diswayed. In short, she had a strong conscience. As the story rushes to the climax, there are several shockers that change the protaganist's motivations. I loved this romantic, suspenseful family saga that often left me breathless. Well written! Thank you to Netgalley and St. Martin's Press. I received a free copy of this book in exchange for an honest review.

I am thoroughly enjoying these Mpow headphones. Can't rave enough about them. The pairing was simple and fast on both my iPad and Samsung phone. The controls are simple. On the earphone itself, allI have to do is move my finger from top to bottom to control the volume or right to left to change tracks. Love the bass and the sound is clear and rich. it seems Mpow thought of everything, including the long play time before having to recharge. It's a whopping 12 hours! I've charged it up and have yet to run out of playtime. Once I adjusted headphones to my head, I found them very comfortable.I've been using them at the gym while on the treadmill listenting to audiobooks. They stay on very well.I haven't had the opportunity to use the detachable cable to directly plug into airplanes or stereos, etc. and with the 12 hour battery life, I don't think I'll even have a need for it. However, I'm glad they have been provided, just in case.The headphones came charged up right out of the sturdy box which I kept for future storage.This is my latest, most favourite toy and I'm loving the exceptional sound. Very highly recommeded.

I own several Mpow products and am always pleased and impressed. The Mpow 40W 5-Port High Speed USB Charger is another excellent product from this conscientious company. I love the fact that there are 5 ports and they all can be considered high speed. This charging unit is highly intelligent as it will detect the device you are plugging in and will safely charge it at the fastest maximum charging speed. There is a flat, matte, rubbery feel to the case which makes it safe to place on wooden worktop without fear of scratches. It comes with its own detachable cable and warranty which assures a 45 day money back promise and 18-months of worry-free use. It's a nice size (easily fits in the palm of my hand) and therefore easy to travel with. I use it to plug in my Kindle, Samsung Note 4, iPod, and iPad Mini all at the same time. All charged up very fast. What really impressed me however, is that the charger will adjust to a slower charging speed when your devices are fully chargedf or if there is a problem with too high or too low voltage. This is a rare feature indeed, especially in such a low priced charger as this. Definitely highly recommended! I love it.

In this dark book, the author delved deep into the inner thoughts and motivations of Elizaveth Bathory, and in this he excelled. I much preferred to stay with Elizabeth's point of view rather than switching back to a modern day descendent. But that's because I'm a purist when it comes to historical fiction and I tend not to be fond of books set in both present and past times. Codrescue does not shy away from the brutality, superstitions, terror, and beliefs of the time including the animosity of the people towards the wealthy nobles. There is much violence in this book, and that must be expected. The murderous acts are chilling and graphic, so brace yourselves. Not for the feint of heart, that's for sure, but Elizabeth's story is all about the murders, and cannot be writtenw without it. The author did a ton of research and this is definitely one of the strengths of this book. The world continues to be fascinated with this notorious woman and this is one book that definitely portrays her accurately, giving readers a glimpse as to what evil lurcked in her mind and heart.For the full review and a brief bio on Elizabeth Bathory visit: [...]

The Pilgrim is a brief novel (165 pages) Helena, a wealthy Roman noblewoman who was cast by her high ranking husband. In accordance with her heaven-sent visions, she travels to Judea where she could be executed for being a follower of Jesus Christ. As assassins tail her and her small group, other followers and believers of Jesus join up with her and her army slowly grows. The setting is the Holy Land during the 4th century. This small but powerful novel is about the courage and faith of Saint Helena and the forgiveness of sins. It is a tale about the True Cross, told by a master storyteller who knows how to engage the reader with his simple, but powerful prose. With each page, Davis builds tension with dangerous circumstances and fascinating characters. This unforgettable story is highly recommended!

At Home in Persimmon Hollow by Gerri Bauer is a Catholic / Christian based historical romance novel. Set in 19th century Florida, at the heart of the story is a young woman named Agnes Foster who was raised in a Catholic orphange by nuns. After an incident with a villain, Rufus Smith, she is compelled to leave the orphanage and strike out on her own as a teacher in Persimmon Hollow. There, through a young 12 year old boy named Billy, she encounters his uncle Seth, a handsome loner. Soon, her past catches up to hger, throwing her into grave danger. In this heartwarming story-line, we experience good vs evil as entire town comes together to either aid or hamper poor Agnes. And of course, love blossoms with Seth.What a stunning cover! It definitely drew me to the book. I enjoyed reading a Catholic romance novel, my first, and the unique setting of 19th century Florida. The Christianity in this novel is a bit stronger than other novels, which will appeal to some and discourage others. For me, it was pure enjoyment. A nice story indeed!Thank you to the author and publisher. I received a free copy of this book in exchange for an honest review.

Maud's line is a tale about the author's own family. The story is set in beautiful Oklahoma, and delves into the culture of the First People of the land and the settlers of the era. The story includes all the expected hardships: hazards, dangers, illnesses - mental and physical, and the violence of the wild American west. The writing is simple to fall into and the story has many fascinating characters. Unfortunately, the heroine, Maud, came across as selfish and prone to foolish decisions. Nevertheless, the story is a portrait of the times and a good history of Oklahoma.Thank you to the author and publisher. I received a free copy of this book in exchange for an honest review.

I have used memory foam on my mattress, but never in pillow form. But now that I have tried this pillow, I know I will never go back to regular pillows again. I have a king-sized bed, so needed a large pillow. I have to admit that I was a bit surprised when I unboxed the Aeris Memory Foam Pillow because it was rather hard to the touch. Yet I've slept on it for a week now and I love how it fits the contours of my face when I lay on it. This pillow has eliminated the need to sleep on two pillows. This plenty provides plenty support. Due to its firmness, I was also worried that it would make my ears sore when laying on it, but I was wrong there too. It fits so perfectly and feels so comfortable when I sleep. Another discovery I made is that it feels much cooler against my face than normal pillows. This is especially noticeable in the summer heat.All in all, I love this pillow and I will never go back to normal pillows again. Love, love, love it! Highly recommended!

The Barcelona Journal Murders is both a love story and a murder mystery. Set in 1906k the protaganist is photographer who teaches a class to young women. He begins to receive anonymous messages as he is drawn in to photographing the bodies of strangled prostitutes by a serial killer.It is evident the author is comfortably familiar with not only the setting, but the history of photography. A lot of historical details are interwoven into the story. I especially enjoyed the toilet snippets taken from newspapers convieniently ripped into to squares for use as bathroom tissue. At a whopping 693 pages, be prepared for a long, but satisfying read. The book is divided into short chapters and scenes, which makes it easy to read.Thank you to the author and publisher. I received a free copy of this book in exchange for an honest review.Orphan of the Olive TreeThe Contessa's Vendetta - Historical Suspense ThrillerThe NoviceThe Betrothal: A Novel

Between the pages of the stunning cover are four heartwarming novellas by four talented, bestselling authors. The four stories swept me to the historical American south and each tale was a wonderful escape. The most enjoyable part was the recipes in each story. So much to love here. If you're looking for rich romance in a brief read, then this book is for you! And if you've never read any of these authors before, it's a wonderful way to get to know them and their work, and follow up with other books they have written.

What this novel does well is that it combines the history of opera in Italy, specifically at La Scala di Milano, with a poignant friendship and love story. It covers all the famous opera singers and composers, as well as some Italian history. It is evident the author did a great deal of research and is passionate about opera and Italian life. At times, there were many sections that read more technically instead of prose-like, and this made the story flow more like a creative non-fiction book than a novel. But the bones are great. Beneath all the information, there is a beautiful tale of friendship and love. This is a wonderful book, accurately written, that will give readers an indepth knowledge about opera with its many performances, singers, and composers. It is a wonderful introduction to the world of opera!

Amazing Product! I've always been skeptical about health product claims, so it is with great pleasure that I announce - THIS PRODUCT WORKS! It truly lives up to all of its claims as listed. The dots are transparent and when applied, cling beautifully. The best thing is that they work. It starts to work immediately on even the deepest acne (those nasty undergrounders) that lie buried beneath your skin. By morning, it will have virtually shrunk. If you have problems with pimples or acne, and want to get rid of them quick, this product is amazing. Small, transparent, waterproof, you can wear it all day and it is virtually unnoticeable. This company also backs up their claims with a 100% guarantee, so there's nothing to loose. I love the reasonable price, the fast shipping, and the brilliance of this product that does all that it's supposed to do. Highly recommended!

I love the reasonable price, the fast shipping, and the brilliance of this product that does all that it's supposed to do. Highly recommended!

There is lots to love in this exciting new novel set in America's gilded age. A very wealthy, aged widower has decided to marry a very young woman and leave the bulk of his estate to her, and he has summoned his lawyer to officially change the will. Of course, this stirs the ire of the man's adult children who are both plagued with severe personal problems. And why is the patriarch marrying such a young woman? Because his dead wife insists upon it. Of great suspicion is the fact that the dead wife is being channeled by the young fiance's sister.Slowly, suspicions arise as secrets are unravelled in this suspenseful story. Nicely written with plenty of plot twists, there is much here to hold your interest from start to finish. A great book to cozy up to!Thank you to the author and publisher. I received a free copy of this book in exchange for an honest review.

Apparently this isn't designed to be an antibiotic. It's just a "silver supplement". Other brands of "colloidal" (apparently more ionic than colloidal?) silver had kept infections away for months. This product did not provide the same apparent protection.

I just paid $100 to get my screen replaced $10 for tempered glass protector to be added to my screen and $20 to buy this case from the repair shop. That night, my phone fell about 20" onto flat sidewalk, face first. It barely made a sound so I thought the impact was minimal. Yet, the screen was severely cracked. As far as I am concerned, this company owes me $130 plus $160 for the 4 hours it will have take to resolve this matter. Vote this review as helpful and maybe Spigen will feel the pressure to be honest about the serious limitations of this product and cover the repairs on phones it has failed to protect.
One leg was about 2" longer than the other. It was a hassle trying to get a refund but I succeeded. The pants were donated.

Fits pretty well but is stiff at first. Fabric softens up after a couple washes. The belt is super cheap and will not last. The belt doesn't feed into the belt loops as the metal piece is too wide. It can be fed into the belt loops but it takes conscious effort to do this at an angle. For the price it should have a nicer belt. It looks a little funny without the belt so I will find an alternate belt.
happy with this
This is not spill proof it is "tip proof" there is a big difference.

Doesn't prevent splashing or spills at all totally useless rim leaks a lot. Maybe ours was defective but I hesitate to try it again. Also, Amazon claims it was not returned when we had returned it weeks ago. Shoppers beware.
Very long! The small size would be appropriate for a 5"8" or taller person wearing tall platforms. You would probably have to be 6'2 (with a 24 inch waist) to make these work with flats.

When I purchased this the description said "Made in the USA". I purchased it because of this. They have now changed the description but did not offer me a return so I will ask Amazon to handle it for me. I trust the Kala health brand. It's more than double the price, but  worth it. After seeing so many pets and people harmed and killed by products made in China, I will buy my health products from manufacturers who avoid production in China. UPDATE- now the listing says manufactured in the USA again. Very strange.Our hypothyroid dog had a significant worsening of symptoms including severe hair loss while on MSM though it is touted to be harmless. I am embarrassed to admit that I was fooled by the claims that this product is as safe as pure water (claimes not necessarily made by this manufacturer). Be wary if you/your pet has an underactive thyroid.

I can't say a lot because I have only used it a handful of times. We have used it to grind thrawed chicken thighs with bone and it has no issue grinding these though I wish there was a super fine grind option for cats The issue we have is with rust. The grinder had been in a cabient for 99% of it's 15month life with us so I can't explain the rust. The seat where the auger sets in is badly rusted. It doesn't fit together very well, but it is still working. Being that we've ground, at most, 50lbs of meat in the first year and the machine is looking as though it will soon be unusable, I cannot advise this machine for anyone who will use it infrequently. If you will grind a thousand pounds of meat with it in the first year it might be worth the $375.

It looks incredibly cheap... but then again it was incredibly cheap. My iphone is yet to arrive so I cannot comment on how well this would work but I seriously doubt this will hold up long term. I would not trust it to be waterproof, but it has seals so water resistance would be likely. I plan to upgrade to a nicer looking waterproof case as soon as someone comes out with one. Please leave comments pointing to other waterproof cases if you have tried others you like. Thanks!
Doesn't feel anything like memory foam. My dogs are disappointed (both the 4 legged ones and those at the distal aspect of my lower limbs).

We used this on a blood stain which was less than a day old. It didn't even dilute the stain and smear it. The stain didn't budge. We've used enzyme cleaners designed for pet waste with much better results.

Somebody bought this and it's in one of our houses. It is pretty nice looking, but the folds won't come out (maybe with a warm water wash in the washer, but we don't see that this is recommended by manufacturer. I don't feel shower curtains made of plastic should cost more than $10.

I wouldn't let dogs over 8lbs use this. The grate flexes as you apply pressure to it which could allow pads to become trapped. This is a good way to create a serious problem like pad amputation or torn ACL or another of a number of injuries your dog might accidentally self-inflict by trying to free itself from these not-great grates. I will write back if the odor control is sufficient for the "No Odor!" claim.  Since I won't let the dogs on it, I might have to get my kid tinkle on it for this part of the test.

Got charged for the "free sample" as follows:tem(s) Subtotal:  $3.99Shipping & Handling:  $0.00Free Sample:  -$0.86  -----Total before tax:  $3.13Sales Tax:  $0.00  -----Total for This Shipment:  $3.13It tasted good, just watch yourself because you may be charged also.

The lid was dented, honey had leaked, what was in the jar was hard as a rock... well a soft rock. I could scrape out some granules and add them to tea. Seems like they just sent us what they couldn't put on their shelf and to me that is bad business.
My only thought is that the hooks should be staggered so u don't have to move items on top hook over to get to items on lower hook.. Looks good. Works as expected.
The whole family uses this on occasion. We like natural products, but this stuff is an amazing detangler for color treated hair, kids hair, and horse tails.

Stink-Ee is what it should be named. Logic doesn't allow me to believe this product instantly eliminates odors in the manner describrd, yet has a very strong fragrance. I think the stink of this product causes my olfactory nerves to short circuit.Maybe it gets rid of urine odor, I cannot say because the perfume is so strong. A cat peed in a dog bed. The dog still used the bed until the wife figured out where the urine smell was coming from. We washed the cover and Soaked interior cushion with stink free. Had to keep cushion outside for 3 days because the new stink from Stink-Eee was overbearing and smelt toxic/irritating. Wife put bed back together and placed a blanket over it. Dog hasn't slept in it for 4 days. She prefered the urine to this stuff. If it does work, I Iike it, but the fragrance has to go. If the stink is gone, why a masking agent?

Three of these contain 1000mg vitamin C as does one effervescent tablet. However the "three gummies" serving contains only a fraction of the other active ingredients. The herbs are the reason I recommend airborne, not the vitamin C. They taste strange and leave a bad flavor in my mouth. It's not unbearable, it's just a little gross. The liquid made with the effervescent tablets does the same thing, but I feel like that goes down really quickly and I can easily rinse away what's left with water. With the gummies, I tried them while I was in places where water wasn't readily available. I am offering constructive criticism so that they might work on the formula.
We put some on a service dog's harness and backpack and they are holding up so far. They are cute, effective and seem of good quality for a decent price. Can't complain.

For the price I wouldn't really complain, but I cant recommend this unless you are going to use it only a few times then throw it away. It becomes worn looking. Even after just 2 days of wear (by a senior pet who sleeps 90% of the time) and one gentle hand washing, the tank looked a mess. I would buy several if they were a better quality fabric because they are cute and seem to be comfortable. We use these types of tanks as "skin protectants" on rescue pets who have had surgeries or skin conditions.  A properly fitted shirt is a great alternative to making a pet wear a cone of shame (elizabethan collar), or a donut/cloud collar, however pets should never be left wearing clothing while unsupervised.

The product we received doesn't remove even fresh blood or wine stains. It doesn't work any better than water for the stains and odors we've tried it on. To put it to the odor test, the wife used this on tile after a cat had urinated. 98% of the urine was wiped up and blotted away with a damp paper towel prior to squirting (ours didn't come in a spray bottle as pictured) the bac-out onto the area. Over the next several days we tested the area for odor. For 4 days the urine odor was still more detectible than the citrus scent of the product so we just wiped it with a wet towel then spritzed the tile with vinegar in case any urine remained. By the next day things were back to odor-free condition.

Calling this "cool comfort nylon" is silly. It's red nylon over neoprene. It is going to hold in heat and is not cool... except in way it looks. Heat stroke is a risk at our San Diego vacation home so we probably won't use it when we train dogs there in the summer. I will say it looks great and the reflective material all around the piping and straps is sensible and will increase dog and handler visibility. The location of the buckle will make it impossible for your dog to lay on the one side comfortably and the adjustment slide could be under the belly or on the other side, giving your service dog limited options for laying comfortably. One can remove the slide and sew the strap to the desired length to eliminate the second issue. I would recommend using a collar with this so when your dog needs to lay for more than 10 minutes, you could remove the "vest" so he/she can be comfortable. We already ask a lot of service dogs by requiring them to pay attention (most pet dogs sleep about 20 hours a day). Many service dog are not of "working" breeds so the stress of working can have an ill effect on their health. The best way around this is to consider your pet's needs and comfort level while working. Providing comfy gear, something soft to lay on (if not a well-furred, sturdy dog), plenty of water offered frequently, booties (if the ground is hot), shade on warm days, and of course our deep appreciation is the best way to ensure their longevity and continued service. Service dogs will do anything to keep their handlers happy so please do your part to be sure your dog isn't over doing it.

Allergy Buster is about $3 less for 33% more (20ml vs 15ml). I have purchased Sinol Allergy Buster and Sinus Plumber to compare all three. I don't  detect much difference. Further I'm not sure the burning and running nose for 45 minutes is worth the relief from a minor headache but it would certainly be worth it if it could halt a migraine. Since I can't share the bottles, I may never get my wife's opinion on how these products affect a migraine but if I do get that feedback, I'll be back to update

I am pleased with the results of this product. We have used it to pack wounds on people and pets and not once has one of these become infected. After being attacked by by a 130lb Police K9 during an examination I resorted to Goldenseal instead of the ER. In our state, a dog would be euthanized for delivering a bite of this nature so I spared him the death sentence and treated the wound discretely at home. I used the contents of one capsule to pack the 2cm deep puncture wound and rubbed some of the powder into  other punctures which were less deep the covered with bandaging. I also ingested 2 capsules 3x day for 5 days and there was no sign of infection. The wound healed with minimal scarring so I am pleased with the results. I'm a fan of Nature's Way Goldenseal Root capsules and always have them in my cabinet.

The one star would be for the nice look of the "fabric" (plastic suede) when it is absolutely clean. As soon as a little drool or grease gets on it, the smudges are super obvious and it looks gross. Pet fur also sticks to it so it needs to be vacuumed, not just brushed off. Our "true microfiber" (a very different and much softer human-grade microfiber) dog beds are wonderful at repelling fur, and are nice, soft and warm to the touch. This material feels firm and cool and our pets will much prefer the beds once we cover them with microfiber or fleece blankets. The bed is not waterproof as was advertised at the time we purchased ours. It is extremely difficult to get the bed back together after washing. Sadly, washing this bed often is absolutely imperative if it will be used by a dog with saliva, coat oils, or fur. It would probably be a much better cat bed since cats typically do not have oily fur and most cats don't drool or get muddy paws. Our one cat has used this bed on occasion after coughing up a hairball in her own bed and having nowhere else to lay, but she doesn't prefer this bed. None of our little dogs or those of our guests, love this bed on it's own. Granted we have a nice variety of beds so there are lots of options to choose from and this one is not  popular at all UNTIL, I fold up a fleece blanket and place it in the bed to soften it up. It is fairly rigid, which is good for looks, but not for comfort. As the other reviewer stated, this bed would be good for a pet with arthritis who might like to curl up but would have trouble walking on a squishy-soft surface.Red Dingo Dark Brown/Light Brown Pet Bed, Donut, Small
It's extremely difficult to put this bed back together after washing and it is not at all waterproof as was promised at the time I purchased it. I hate the Red Dingo Donut bed with a passion.

Just know that this harness is a deep bubble gum pink. I feel like the image may be purposely altered to give a pleasant dusty rose or non-obnoxious pink color. We're making it work, but it's really too pink to complement any natural dog fur/hair tones.These are a much simpler product than Buddy Belts yet these continue to rise in price to match the price of Buddy Belts. I'm not seeing the craftsmanship here that I see in the Buddy Belts. For sure the Buddy Belt is better engineered and better looking.
